## ğŸ“¦ Complete Technology Stack

### **Frontend Technologies**
```yaml
Core:
  - React: 19.1.1
  - TypeScript: 5.9.3
  - Vite: 7.1.7

State & Routing:
  - Redux Toolkit: 2.9.2
  - React Router DOM: 7.9.4

Animations:
  - GSAP: 3.13.0
  - Motion: 12.23.24

HTTP Client:
  - Axios: 1.13.1

Development:
  - ESLint: 9.36.0
  - TypeScript ESLint: 8.45.0
```

### **Backend Technologies**
```yaml
Core:
  - NestJS: 10.0.0
  - TypeScript: 5.1.3
  - Node.js: 20+

Database:
  - MongoDB: 8.19.2
  - Mongoose: 8.19.2

Authentication:
  - Passport: 0.7.0
  - Passport JWT: 4.0.1
  - JWT: 10.2.0
  - Bcrypt: 5.1.1

Validation:
  - Class Validator: 0.14.1
  - Class Transformer: 0.5.1

Testing:
  - Jest: 29.5.0
  - Supertest: 7.0.0

Development:
  - Prettier: 3.0.0
  - ESLint: 8.42.0
```

## ğŸ”Œ API Endpoints

### **Authentication Endpoints**
```
POST   /api/auth/register     # à¸¥à¸‡à¸—à¸°à¹€à¸šà¸µà¸¢à¸™à¸œà¸¹à¹‰à¹ƒà¸Šà¹‰à¹ƒà¸«à¸¡à¹ˆ
POST   /api/auth/login        # à¹€à¸‚à¹‰à¸²à¸ªà¸¹à¹ˆà¸£à¸°à¸šà¸š
GET    /api/auth/profile      # à¸”à¸¹à¸‚à¹‰à¸­à¸¡à¸¹à¸¥à¹‚à¸›à¸£à¹„à¸Ÿà¸¥à¹Œ (à¸•à¹‰à¸­à¸‡ JWT)
```

### **Users Management**
```
GET    /api/users             # à¸£à¸²à¸¢à¸à¸²à¸£à¸œà¸¹à¹‰à¹ƒà¸Šà¹‰à¸—à¸±à¹‰à¸‡à¸«à¸¡à¸”
GET    /api/users/:id         # à¸‚à¹‰à¸­à¸¡à¸¹à¸¥à¸œà¸¹à¹‰à¹ƒà¸Šà¹‰à¸•à¸²à¸¡ ID
PUT    /api/users/:id         # à¸­à¸±à¸›à¹€à¸”à¸•à¸‚à¹‰à¸­à¸¡à¸¹à¸¥à¸œà¸¹à¹‰à¹ƒà¸Šà¹‰
DELETE /api/users/:id         # à¸¥à¸šà¸œà¸¹à¹‰à¹ƒà¸Šà¹‰
```

### **Products Management**
```
GET    /api/products          # à¸£à¸²à¸¢à¸à¸²à¸£à¸ªà¸´à¸™à¸„à¹‰à¸²à¸—à¸±à¹‰à¸‡à¸«à¸¡à¸”
GET    /api/products/:id      # à¸‚à¹‰à¸­à¸¡à¸¹à¸¥à¸ªà¸´à¸™à¸„à¹‰à¸²à¸•à¸²à¸¡ ID
POST   /api/products          # à¹€à¸à¸´à¹ˆà¸¡à¸ªà¸´à¸™à¸„à¹‰à¸²à¹ƒà¸«à¸¡à¹ˆ (Admin only)
PUT    /api/products/:id      # à¸­à¸±à¸›à¹€à¸”à¸•à¸‚à¹‰à¸­à¸¡à¸¹à¸¥à¸ªà¸´à¸™à¸„à¹‰à¸² (Admin only)

```

## ğŸ” Security Enhancements

- ğŸ”’ **JWT Token Authentication**
- ğŸ”‘ **Bcrypt Password Hashing** (10 rounds)
- âœ… **Input Validation** (Frontend & Backend)
- ğŸ›¡ï¸ **CORS Protection**
- ğŸ” **Environment Variables** for sensitive data
- ğŸš« **NoSQL Injection Protection**
- âš ï¸ **Rate Limiting Ready**
- ğŸ” **Request Validation Pipes**

---

## ğŸš€ Installation & Setup

### **Prerequisites**
- Node.js 20+
- MongoDB 6.0+
- npm or yarn

### **Quick Start**

#### **1. Clone Repository**
```bash
git clone https://github.com/xenodeve/Hype-Macro_Store.git
cd Hype-Macro_Store
```

#### **2. Backend Setup**
```bash
cd Nestjs
npm install

# Create .env file
echo "MONGODB_URI=mongodb://localhost:27017/hype-macro-store" > .env
echo "JWT_SECRET=your-super-secret-key" >> .env
echo "PORT=3000" >> .env

# Start backend
npm run start:dev
```

#### **3. Frontend Setup**
```bash
cd ../React
npm install

# Start frontend
npm run dev
```

#### **4. Access Application**
- Frontend: `http://localhost:5173`
- Backend API: `http://localhost:3000`

---

## ğŸ“Š Performance Improvements

### **Frontend**
- âš¡ **50% Faster Build** - à¸”à¹‰à¸§à¸¢ Vite
- ğŸ“¦ **Smaller Bundle Size** - Tree shaking + code splitting
- ğŸ¨ **GPU Accelerated Animations** - GSAP optimization
- ğŸš€ **Hot Module Replacement** - Instant updates

### **Backend**
- ğŸ”„ **Async Operations** - Non-blocking I/O
- ğŸ’¾ **Database Indexing** - Faster queries
- âš¡ **Connection Pooling** - Efficient DB connections
- ğŸ“ˆ **Scalable Architecture** - Ready for growth

---

## ğŸ”„ Breaking Changes from v1.x

### **âš ï¸ Migration Required**

1. **Static Site â†’ Full-Stack App**
   - Old: HTML/CSS/JavaScript files
   - New: React + NestJS applications
   - Migration: Complete rewrite with modern stack

2. **No Backend â†’ Full Backend API**
   - Old: Static data in JavaScript
   - New: MongoDB database with REST API
   - Migration: Data must be seeded to database

3. **Deployment Changes**
   - Old: Simple static hosting
   - New: Separate Frontend & Backend deployment
   - Migration: Two deployment processes required

---
